item.description:
Whist is an easy, fun, trick-taking game. Don't worry if you've never played it! If you've ever played hearts, spades, down-and-up the ladder, Wizard, or bridge, you can start playing Whist almost immediately. We should get some carpools together and hit a few Whist events, starting with this one!

 

Here's the scoop on this event, provided by John Gouveia, one of our members: Hi, Here is an idea for another meetup... I know a few folks from your group went last year.... Killdeer Island Club Public Whist Party on Sunday Oct, 2nd... $2.00 admission includes dinner at 12:00 noon with Whist Game to follow at 1 p. m. .... Killdeer Island Club House, 191 Killdeer Island Road, Webster, Ma . Contact Ruth at (508) 949-1498.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Killdeer Island Club Public Whist Party
